mapper.select: SELECT B.CNO, B.WRITER, B.CONTENT, B.BNO, B.STATE, B.CREATED FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.CNO, A.WRITER, A.CONTENT, A.BNO, A.STATE, A.CREATED FROM (SELECT CNO, WRITER, CONTENT, BNO, STATE, CREATED FROM COMMENTS WHERE BNO = #{bNo} ORDER BY CNO DESC)A)B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
